p: 3-benzamido-N-(2,6-dimethyl-4-(pentafluorothio)phenyl)-2-fluorobenzamide ( 4d). This follows the general method. The residue was purified by column chromatography on a silica gel (Hexane:EtOAc = 10:1) to give the desired diamide 4d as a white solid (52.7 mg, 70% yield). mp 205~206 °C; 1H-NMR (500 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 8.60 (t, J = 7.9 Hz, 1H), 8.13 (s, 1H), 7.93–7.90 (m, 2H), 7.85–7.80 (m, 2H), 7.64–7.59 (m, 1H), 7.56–7.51 (m, 4H), 7.36 (t, J = 8.0 Hz, 1H), 2.36 (s, 6H); 13C-NMR (100 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 165.6, 161.4, 161.3, 136.5, 136.4, 133.9, 132.5, 129.0, 127.1, 126.9, 126.8, 126.4, 126.4, 126.1, 126.15, 125.8, 125.8, 125.7, 125.3, 125.2, 18.9; 19F-NMR (470 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 84.69 (quin, 1F, J SF–SF4, J = 150.3, SF), 63.09 (d, 4F, J SF4–SF, J = 149.7 Hz, SF 4), −131.55 (s, 1F); HRMS (EI) calcd. for C 22H 18F 6N 2O 2S 488.0993, found 488.0988 (see Supplementary Materials).
